product_name: CatEye Strada CC-RD420DW Digital Wireless Bike Computer
long_description: The CatEye Strada CC-RD420DW Digital wireless bike computer adds heart rate tracking to the simple, reliable and compact Strada design, making it easy to track performance on the go.
short_description: The CatEye Strada CC-RD420DW Digital wireless bike computer adds heart rate tracking to the simple, reliable and compact Strada design, making it easy to track performance on the go.
